root.text: There's a note in my jacket...
"Alison took your phone and gave it to Alex and Ana. (continues on the backside)."
"She had to give'em your password or your phone" (end of the note).
I understand what happened this morning. Was she threatened too?
Shit. I don't have any unlocking code or pattern. What would they have done with it?
And I won't be able to see Alex, Ana or Alison until tomorrow.
